Description: Complete weft-faced plain weave cloth of plain unbleached linen. A looped fringe down one selvedge; a border with very short loops across one end; the other end a fringe of cut threads. In one corner, a painted 'quality mark,' faded dark brown. Warp: Linen s-spin, s-spliced, c. 35 ends per cm. Weft: Linen s-spin, s-spliced, c. 16 picks per cm.
